item.title: Presentations as Code - How to use Obsidian Advanced Slides
item.description: The Obsidian Advanced Slides plugin is a great way to create presentations as code (or notes) from right inside your Obsidian vault. Using this plugin has helped me reduce the friction and the time between creating something and sharing it, whether that’s a presentation, a coding project, a video, or a blog post.
